entries.name: Lockpick
locality: rarely found outside of the theives guild.
entries.properties:
Lockpicks are required to open locked objects or lock an unlocked object.
Sleight of hand check is made on lock.
If fail, the lockpick is destroyed and any trap is triggered.
entries.description: An thin iron instrument bent to match a lock's pins.

entries.name: Alchemy kit
entries.properties: Every tool needed to perform alchemy.
entries.description: Contains mortar and pestle, flasks, and tubes in a portable leather case.

entries.name: Alchemy supplies
entries.properties: Every tool needed to perform alchemy.
entries.description: Mortar and pestle, flasks, and tubes.

entries.name: Brewing supplies
entries.properties:
All things needed for brewing ale and Aleberry (ale and spice) except malt and water.
To make 5 pints (5 lbs) of ale: 5 lbs of water and 1 lbs of malt are required to cook then ferment for 2-5 weeks.
entries.description: Fermenting pot, brewers pot, wooden barrel, and common spices.

entries.name: Calligraphy kit
entries.properties: All things needed for writing letters, creating documents, and forging.
entries.description: A wooden box with pen, brush, fine paper, ink, stamps, and wax.

entries.name: Carpenter tools
entries.properties: All tools needed to create wooden items or furniture.
entries.description: A mallet, assorted chizels, small saw, ruler, auger, plane, and iron nails.

entries.name: Cartography tools
entries.properties: All things needed for navigation and map making except a blank canvas.
entries.description: A compass, triangle, pen and ink, nautical divider, astrolabe, and sextant instrument.

entries.name: Cooking tools
entries.properties: All tools needed to cook a good meal.
entries.description: A brass pan, cast iron pot, assorted bowls, spoons, knifes, forks, and serving plates.

entries.name: Jewelry making tools
entries.properties: All tools needed to make jewelry or engravings.
entries.description: A bow drill, gravers and burins of different sizes, a hammer, needle and thread.

entries.name: Leatherwork tools
entries.properties: All tools needed to make leather items.
entries.description: A cobbler's last, knife, shaving and stitch-marking tool, pliers, and gravers.

entries.name: Painting kit
entries.properties: All things needed for painting.
entries.description: Paint brushes, colors, a pencil, water basin, small fine paper, and a palette.

entries.name: Pottery tools
entries.properties: All tools needed for making clay pots and sculpters.
entries.description: A sponge, wire clay cutter, rib, ribbons, and boxwood tools.

entries.name: Smithing supplies
entries.properties: All tools needed for making weapons and armor except for a forge and metal.
entries.description: Assorted hammers, stakes, prongs, an avil, bellow, and a bucket of coal.

entries.name: Weaving supplies
entries.properties: All tools needed for making clothes, blankets, or tapestries except balls of yarn.
entries.description: Assorted hammers needles, hooks, combs, spools, and a loom.

entries.name: Mechanic supplies
entries.properties: All tools needed for tinkering with and repairing mechanisms.
entries.description: An incredible variety of tools packed in a large chest.

entries.name: Mechanic kit
entries.properties: All tools needed for tinkering with and repairing mechanisms.
entries.description: A variety of tools neatly fitted in a briefcase.

entries.name: Makeup kit
entries.properties: Useful for altering appearance to influence through beauty or deceive through disguise.
entries.description: Brushes, cotton swaps, cosmetics, hair dye, and simple perfumes.

entries.name: Game set
entries.properties: Played for gambling or for fun. For a list of games, see: goo.gl/gVhkO4
entries.description: A small box of dice, cards, and chips.

entries.name: Bagpipe
entries.properties: Can be played as a musical instrument
entries.description: A musical instrument made of a pressurized leather bag that is squeezed to release air into reed pipes.

entries.name: Drum
entries.properties: Can be played as a musical instrument
entries.description: Leather skin wrapped tightly over a bucket-like cylinder. Hit with a mallet or stick as rhythmic music.

entries.name: Flute
entries.properties: Can be played as a musical instrument
entries.description: A wind pipe carved with holes along the shaft that is blown into.

entries.name: Lute
entries.properties: Can be played as a musical instrument
entries.description: A string instrument with a rounded body and short neck that is plucked.

entries.name: Lyre
entries.properties: Can be played as a musical instrument
entries.description: A u-shaped string instrument with a crossbar holding verticle strings tight that is plucked.

entries.name: Viol
entries.properties: Can be played as a musical instrument
entries.description: A short string instrument with a curved body and thin neck that is played with a bow.
